name: Battle of Minigames
description:
An infinite game, in which you can explore space, sail the seas and even cross the highway, but with a complication ... THE GAME HAS ROTATE EVERY 10 SECONDS!

But be careful, watch your gasoline and collect gems to survive.

-MeganiGames 2021-

-Game made in Unity-

-2 game modes

-Infinity mode: the traditional game mode, survive, refuel and collect coins.

-Survival mode: An alternative to the traditional mode, if what you want is to get the best possible time, this is your mode!

-Table of scores-

-Buying system-

-5 Minigames-

-25 skins-
